thread.title: Willie Nelson, Merle Haggard Thursday SC show postponed

title: Willie Nelson, Merle Haggard Thursday SC show postponed
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Willie Nelson, Merle Haggard Thursday SC show postponed Fans of country music legends Willie Nelson and Merle Haggard will not be seeing the pair play on Thursday as originally planned; the show has been postponed due to a medical issue with Willie Nelson, according to the venue, Florence Civic Center. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Willie Nelson, Merle Haggard Thursday SC show postponed Elizabeth Thomas, WCNC.com Staff 6:08 p.m. EDT October 14, 2015 LAS VEGAS, NV - MARCH 10: Recording artists Willie Nelson and Merle Haggard perform during the opening night of The Smith Center for the Performing Arts on March 10, 2012 in Las Vegas, Nevada. (Photo by Bryan Steffy/Getty Images for The Smith Center) (Photo: Bryan Steffy) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
FLORENCE, S.C. -- Fans of country music legends Willie Nelson and Merle Haggard will not be seeing the pair play on Thursday as originally planned; the show has been postponed due to a medical issue with Willie Nelson, according to the venue, Florence Civic Center. 
The Civic Center told NashvilleGab.com that Nelson's condition is not-life threatening, but will require several weeks to recover. 
According to WillieNelson.com , in addition to to Thursday's show in Florence, Friday's show in Roanoke, Virginia has also been postponed. A show Saturday in Reading, Pennsylvania has been canceled, but as of this writing, Nelson's performance at the American Roots Music & Arts Festival in Raleigh Sunday is still a-go. 
The Florence Civic Center says fans can get refunds at their point of purchase if they're unable to attend the rescheduled show, which is currently slated for April 6, however the latest statement from the venue says that date may change again: We have a new update on the Willie Nelson & Merle Haggard postponement. It appears there may now be a hiccup with the April 6, 2016 date; however we are certainly rescheduling the show. Due to the logistical issues of coordinating several cities and rescheduling multiple dates, the tour is still finalizing these details. The tour hopes to announce the official Florence date early next week. Do not fret fans, we are working hard to finalize this and will keep you updated.
